bib.title: Organic waste-borne ZnS nanoparticles: The forgotten ones
bib.author: Clément Levard and Maureen Le Bars and T Formentini and Samuel Legros and Emmanuel Doelsch
bib.abstract: Highlights: 13 o Considerably more ZnS-NPs are released into the environment than most commercial NPs 14 o The fate of incidental ZnS-NPs formed in organic waste has been completely overlooked 15 o ZnS-NPs that form in organic waste are small and exhibit unique structural properties 16 o The reactivity and ecotoxicity of ZnS-NPs may be enhanced due to their small size 17 18
